Content_FullWidth.Name: Directions to Badger Creek
Content_FullWidth.Title: Directions to Badger Creek
Content_FullWidth.Abstract: These are directions to Badger Creek from rexburg, Ashton and Driggs.
Content_FullWidth.BodyCopy:
From Rexburg

Travel North on Highway 20 for 4.0 miles. At the Highway 33 Junction turn right. Travel east for 39 miles. As you approach Tetonia, the road will curve to the right. Turn off the highway (left) about midway through the curve. Pass by the Rammels Valley Pack and continue straight north about 3.0 miles. At the "T" junction, turn right. Continue down the road until you come to the marked entrance of BYU-Idaho Outdoor Learning Center. Take the second entrance next to the large building with the light blue roof.

From Ashton

Traveling South from West Yellowstone, Montana on Highway 20, you will arrive at the city of Ashton, Idaho. Turn left at the controlled intersection. (The Frost Top Drive-in is located on the westÂ side of the road.) Drive all the way through town. You will approach the junction of Highway 32. Turn right (south). Travel approximately 29.0 miles until you reach the junction of Highway 33. Turn left. As you approach Tetonia, the road will curve to the right. Turn off the highway (left) about midway through the curve. Pass by the Rammels Valley Pack and continue straight north about 3.0 miles. At the "T" junction, turn right. Continue down the road until you come to the marked entrance of BYU-Idaho Outdoor Learning Center. Take the second entrance next to the large building with the light blue roof.

From Driggs

From Driggs continue North on Highway 33, following it to Tetonia. Pass through the town. Approximately 0.6 miles past the church the road will curve left. Turn off the highway (right) about midway through the curve. Pass by the Rammels Valley Pack and continue straight north about 3.0 miles. At the "T" junction, turn right. Continue down the road until you come to the marked entrance of BYU-Idaho Outdoor Learning Center. Take the second entrance next to the large building with the light blue roof.
